row.entry: This identifies the pharmacological drug class, such as Cephalosporins. Shall contain a value descending from the NDF-RT concept types of "Mechanism of Action - N0000000223", "Physiologic Effect - N0000009802" or "Chemical Structure - N0000000002". NUI will be used as the concept code. http://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=77FDBFB5-A277-DE11-9B52-0015173D1785
